reviews.text: The facilities are reasonable. It could do with a cafe & a small shop for newspapers. The staff are professional & helpful. The waiting room could open longer. The car parking is amble. The alterations to the platform areas are poor: the shelters are smaller, drafty & much less comfortable overall. This was a tangible & real step backwards in valuing passengers, or customers as modern parlance would have it.

Friendly staff, can even pick up revered tickets here at last (which is great) watchbout for relatively short hours where staff are in ticket office however. Not sure the loos are open when there's no-one in the ticket office.

Opening hours are 07:00 - 13:30 Mon-Sat and closed all day Sunday. Considering a lot of guards don't know how short the opening hours are from here be prepared to be interrogated as to why you didn't buy a ticket from the ticket office.
Clean station friendly staff and train on time .😁
